Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility ( μ ) was estimated in the saturated regime from the derivative plots of the square root of source - drain current ( I SD ) versus gate voltage ( V G ) through equation 2 where W is the channel width , L is the channel length , C i is the capacitance per unit area of the gate dielectric layer ( SiO 2 , 500 nm , C i = 7.5 nF / cm^2 ) , and V T is the threshold voltage.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| SiO<sub>2</sub> |

Explanation:

The material name "SiO2" (Silicon dioxide) is explicitly mentioned in the paragraph as the gate dielectric layer material with a specified thickness of 500 nm.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| SiO<sub>2</sub> |

Explanation:

The only material name in the paragraph is "SiO2" (Silicon dioxide), which is explicitly mentioned as the gate dielectric layer material with a specified thickness of 500 nm. The other terms like "W", "L", "C i", and "V T" are not material names, and they are removed from the table.
